data.text: Yahweh, I have heard about you;
In the vision, I saw God, the Holy One, coming from the Teman district in Edom;
His glory was like [SIM] a sunrise;
He sent plagues in front of him,
When he stopped, the earth shook.
In the vision I saw the people who live in tents in the Cushan region being afflicted,
Yahweh, was it because you were angry with the rivers and streams that you were angry with them?
It was as though you uncovered your bow,
It is as though the mountains saw you doing that,
The sun and moon stopped moving in the sky
Being very angry [DOU], you walked across the earth
But you also went to rescue us, your people,
With his own spear you destroyed the leader of those soldiers who rushed like [SIM] a whirlwind to attack and scatter us,
You walked through the sea with your horses to destroy our enemies,
I will rejoice because I know Yahweh.
Yahweh the Lord is the one who causes me to be strong;
